name: theophobia
description:
theophobia

spend some fun, quality time with a young girl named angel!! help her find her journal and learn more about her on the way. 

note: this is my very first rpgmaker game, and is also... exceedingly short. i can't imagine it being much longer than like 5 minutes to finish. i really wanted to do this to learn more about rpgmaker and, honestly just for fun!! so i hope you can enjoy it :)

be wary this game has some mildly unsettling moments
